mapper.insert: INSERT INTO VIDEO ( VIDEO_ID , CHANNEL_ID , TITLE , UPLOADER_ID , RUNNING_TIME , VIEW_COUNT , UPLOAD_DATE , POSTER_PATH , VIDEO_PATH ) VALUES ( 'VD-'|| TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24') || '-' || LPAD(VIDEO_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 6, '0') , '1' , #{title} , #{uploaderId} , 120 , 0 , SYSDATE , #{posterPath} , #{videoPath} )
mapper.select: SELECT videoId , channelId , title , uploaderId , runningTime , viewCount , uploadDate , posterPath , videoPath , CASE WHEN DATE_DIFF >= 365 THEN TRUNC(DATE_DIFF / 365) || '년 전' WHEN DATE_DIFF >= 30 THEN TRUNC(DATE_DIFF / 30) || '개월 전' WHEN DATE_DIFF < 30 AND DATE_DIFF >= 7 THEN TRUNC(DATE_DIFF / 7) || '주 전' WHEN DATE_DIFF < 30 AND DATE_DIFF >= 1 THEN TRUNC(DATE_DIFF) || '일 전' WHEN TRUNC(DATE_DIFF * 24) < 24 AND TRUNC(DATE_DIFF * 24 ) > 0 THEN TRUNC(DATE_DIFF * 24) || '시간 전' WHEN TRUNC(DATE_DIFF * 24 * 60) < 60 AND TRUNC(DATE_DIFF * 24 * 60) > 5 THEN TRUNC(DATE_DIFF * 24 * 60) || '분 전' WHEN TRUNC(DATE_DIFF * 24 * 60) < 6 THEN '방금 전' END dateDiff FROM ( SELECT VIDEO_ID videoId , CHANNEL_ID channelId , TITLE title , UPLOADER_ID uploaderId , RUNNING_TIME runningTime , VIEW_COUNT viewCount , UPLOAD_DATE uploadDate , POSTER_PATH posterPath , VIDEO_PATH videoPath , SYSDATE - TO_DATE( TO_CHAR(UPLOAD_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') , 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') DATE_DIFF FROM VIDEO WHERE VIDEO_ID = #{videoId} )

SELECT VIDEO_ID , CHANNEL_ID , TITLE , UPLOADER_ID , RUNNING_TIME , VIEW_COUNT , UPLOAD_DATE , POSTER_PATH , VIDEO_PATH , CASE WHEN DATE_DIFF >= 365 THEN TRUNC(DATE_DIFF / 365) || '년 전' WHEN DATE_DIFF >= 30 THEN TRUNC(DATE_DIFF / 30) || '개월 전' WHEN DATE_DIFF < 30 AND DATE_DIFF >= 7 THEN TRUNC(DATE_DIFF / 7) || '주 전' WHEN DATE_DIFF < 30 AND DATE_DIFF >= 1 THEN TRUNC(DATE_DIFF) || '일 전' WHEN TRUNC(DATE_DIFF * 24) < 24 AND TRUNC(DATE_DIFF * 24 ) > 0 THEN TRUNC(DATE_DIFF * 24) || '시간 전' WHEN TRUNC(DATE_DIFF * 24 * 60) < 60 AND TRUNC(DATE_DIFF * 24 * 60) > 5 THEN TRUNC(DATE_DIFF * 24 * 60) || '분 전' WHEN TRUNC(DATE_DIFF * 24 * 60) < 6 THEN '방금 전' END DATE_DIFF FROM ( SELECT VIDEO_ID , CHANNEL_ID , TITLE , UPLOADER_ID , RUNNING_TIME , VIEW_COUNT , UPLOAD_DATE , POSTER_PATH , VIDEO_PATH , SYSDATE - TO_DATE( TO_CHAR(UPLOAD_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') , 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') DATE_DIFF FROM VIDEO ORDER BY VIDEO_ID DESC )
